Class ApplicantReportFilterView

com.group6.views.management.ApplicantReportFilterView
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticatedView, View
public class ApplicantReportFilterView extends Object implements AuthenticatedView
An extended view of ProjectsViewFiltersView. Similar layout, just adding on.
